name: Hentai puzzle ? Not again....
description:
Hentai puzzle ? Not again.... is simple puzzle game Included are 3 types of puzzle games: Sexy Puzzle , Puzzle Logic and Mosaic.

Features:
- Beautiful nude girls
- 3 types of puzzle games ( choose which one you want)
- You can set size for puzzle ( min 2x2 max 18x18 but you can do 2x18)
- Lovely music
- Nice graphics
- Easy achievements
- Community achievements
